description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Chicken With Fennel Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Orange,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken
name: Creamy Chicken With Fennel Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600g free range chicken stir fry strips

recipeInstructions.text: Using a vegetable peeler or sharp knife, very thinly shave or slice fennel. Put into a large bowl. Remove skin and pith from 3 oranges and cut into segments. Add to fennel with olives. Juice remaining orange, place into a separate bowl and whisk in 2 tbs of oil. Season with salt and pepper.

Heat remaining oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken, in batches, for 5 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a bowl. Add cream cheese, cream and mustard to pan. Stir until smooth. Return chicken to pan and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Season with salt and pepper. Serve chicken with fennel salad and top with chopped chives.
